subject: I know, old news, and everyone knows better.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I get this stuff over and over and over and over and over... and I can see
no reason why the new age gurus proclaiming 2012 will be a great and hppy
transformation are any more correct, or valid. They spout only an opinion,
an opinioin of denial of all facts, and none of the ancient prophecies from
around the world say "and they all lived happily ever after". I would prefer
to cross over conciously, not with my head up my butt hoping the outside
world is really a paradise. No one wants to face the possiblity, just like
the commercial, maybe we should chug on over to mambe pambe land and get you
some backbone! We all know life is forever through EVP and spirit
communication, so in a way it's a transformation to higher conciousness, but
I think ya have to be aware. Everyone runing around trying to figure out
what the ancients were trying to "tell us"--dah, a simple message, wake the
f---- up!

 They keep telling me I have to leave--what? Just jump off!? WFT is that?

Anyway, I would not say it is 100%, and when 2013 comes, I will burn every
frikkin' box I have and move on to something else.

F-S
